name: src/config.js
content:
/**
 * Config data for Paraglider.
 *
 * @file config.js
 * @module config
 * @author Gregor Adams <greg@pixelass.com>
 */

/**
 * Default classList for the plugin.
 * This object can be replaced but not merged
 * @type {object}
 * @prop {string} pluginLoaded Applied when the plugin has been loaded
 * @prop {string} init Applied when the pugin has been initialized. Removed on first interaction.
 * @prop {string} slides This element will be used to track touches. This is the wrapper around the slides.
 * @prop {string} slide Selector for each single slide.
 * @prop {string} current Appied to the currently visible slide
 * @prop {string} previous Applied to the previous slide in the queue
 * @prop {string} next Applied to the next slide in the queue
 */
const classNames = {
  pluginLoaded: 'pluginLoaded',
  slide: 'slide',
  slides: 'slides',
  init: 'init',
  current: 'current',
  previous: 'previous',
  next: 'next'
}

/**
 * Defaults for the main plugin.
 * @type {object}
 * @prop {classNames} classNames Mapping of class names to be used by the plugin.
 * @prop {null|onSlide} onSlide Callback while the slider is moving.
 * @prop {null|onEnd} onEnd Callback while the slider stopped moving.
 * @prop {number} speed Animation duration when using paging.
 * @prop {number} spring Animation duration when snapping.
 * @prop {number} snapBackAt Amount of distance needed to snap. [0, 1]
 * @prop {number} threshold Threshold of pixels until the sliding mechanisms is triggered.
 * @prop {number} initialSlide Initially visible slide
 */
const PLUGIN_DEFAULTS = {
  classNames,
  onSlide: null,
  onEnd: null,
  speed: 250,
  spring: 100,
  snapBackAt: 0.25,
  threshold: 10,
  initialSlide: 0
}

/**
 * Defaults for the presets.
 * @type {object}
 * @prop {classNames} classNames Mapping of class names to be used by the plugin.
 * @prop {string} classNames.dot Selector for pager dots.
 * @prop {string} classNames.active Active class for pager dots.
 * @prop {string} classNames.nextButton Selector for the navigation to the next slide.
 * @prop {string} classNames.prevButton Selector for the navigation to the previous slide.
 */
const PRESET_DEFAULTS = {
  classNames: {
    ...classNames,
    dot: 'dot',
    active: 'active',
    nextButton: 'nextButton',
    prevButton: 'prevButton'
  }
}

export {
  classNames,
  PLUGIN_DEFAULTS,
  PRESET_DEFAULTS
}

name: classNames
description:
Default classList for the plugin.
This object can be replaced but not merged

unknown.tagValue: {string} pluginLoaded Applied when the plugin has been loaded
{string} init Applied when the pugin has been initialized. Removed on first interaction.

{string} current Appied to the currently visible slide
{string} previous Applied to the previous slide in the queue
{string} next Applied to the next slide in the queue

description: Defaults for the main plugin.

unknown.tagValue: {classNames} classNames Mapping of class names to be used by the plugin.
{null|onSlide} onSlide Callback while the slider is moving.
{null|onEnd} onEnd Callback while the slider stopped moving.
{number} speed Animation duration when using paging.
{number} spring Animation duration when snapping.
{number} snapBackAt Amount of distance needed to snap. [0, 1]
{number} threshold Threshold of pixels until the sliding mechanisms is triggered.
{number} initialSlide Initially visible slide

name: PRESET_DEFAULTS
description: Defaults for the presets.

unknown.tagValue: {classNames} classNames Mapping of class names to be used by the plugin.
{string} classNames.dot Selector for pager dots.
{string} classNames.active Active class for pager dots.
{string} classNames.nextButton Selector for the navigation to the next slide.
{string} classNames.prevButton Selector for the navigation to the previous slide.

name: src/dist.js
content:
/**
 * Globally assigned version of Paraglider.
 *
 * @file dist.js
 * @module dist
 * @author Gregor Adams <greg@pixelass.com>
 */

import API from './glider'
import * as presets from './presets'
import wrapper from './presets/wrapper'

/**
 * Global Paraglider
 * @type {object}
 * @prop {function} API
 * @prop {function} wrapper
 * @prop {function} belt
 * @prop {function} coverLeft
 * @prop {function} coverRight
 * @prop {function} coverLeftRight
 */
global.Paraglider = {
  API,
  wrapper,
  ...presets
}

name: src/glider/index.js
Glider
description: Paraglider plugin.

params.name: offset
params.description: Offset of the element to either side.

params.name: data.rest
params.description: Array of all remaining slide indexes

params.name: data.rest
params.description: Array of all remaining slide indexes

name: constructor
description:
A simple slider API. This class simply applies classnames
to the current and surrounding slides.

It offers an API that allows you to implement any behaviour imaginable. ðŸ˜‚

unknown.tagValue: {this}

params.name: options
params.description: Custom options for the Plugin call

name: options
description: Plugin options merged from defaults and custom configuration

name: _state
description: State store for interaction flags

name: setState
description: Handles internal storage

params.name: newState
params.description: The new state porperties to merge into the old state

name: state
description: Getter for the state

unknown.tagValue: {object}

name: init
description:
Init call for the plugin.

This method assigns the element to the plugin scope, adds the required
eventListeners and class names.

params.name: el
params.description:
An element containing the required markup with and
selectors

name: el
description: Outer element

name: slidesWrapper
description: This element is used to track mouse or touch interaction

name: slides
description: A list of all slides.

name: destroy
description: Destroys the plugin by removing eventlisteners and class names

name: addListeners
description:
Adds eventlisteners needed for this plugin to work.
Movement and release should be tracked on window or document.

name: removeListeners
description: Removes all eventlisteners. (Helpful when destroying the plugin instance)

name: addClassNames
description: Adds class names to slides

name: addInitClassNames
description:
Initially set class names

`init` will be removed after the first interaction. It allows a 'silent' start
when working with CSS animations or transitions.

name: removeClassNames
description:
Batch removal of class names.
This is dirty but simply removes anything the plugin could have set.

name: addSides
description:
Add `previous` and `next` classes around the `current` slide.
This function respects pager clicks, which modify the next or previous element.

name: nextSlide
description: Moves to the next slide via trigger.

name: prevSlide
description: Moves to the previous slide via trigger.

name: goTo
description: Moves to the nth slide via trigger. Respects left/right movement

name: spring
description: Handles the snap animation

params.name: duration
params.description: Time to pass the until animation is done.

name: getClientX
description:
Find clientX from the event.
This helper will return the correct value for touch or mouse.

unknown.tagValue: {number} THe clientX of the event

name: getReturnValues
description: Prepares return values

unknown.tagValue: {object}

name: handleDown
description:
First interaction with the mouse or per touch will be used to set flags and
define initial values.

name: handleUp
description:
Last interaction with the mouse or per touch will be used to set flags
and define initial values.
Only fires if down is active. Prevents unintended behaviour when the first
touch or mousedown was outside the element.

name: handleMove
description:
Handler vor mouse or touch movement.
Waits for a threshold and then records the movement on the `x` axis

name: handleProgress
description:
Handles the progress. Calculates the progress from the
internal state and element dimension.
A callback is fired if set

name: handleEnd
description:
Handle the end of the slide animation.
If there is a callback called `onEnd` call it.

name: src/helpers.js
content:
/* global document */
/**
 * A collection of helper functions.
 *
 * @file helpers.js
 * @module helpers
 * @author Gregor Adams <greg@pixelass.com>
 */

/* istanbul ignore next */
/**
 * Animates from one value to the other over a given time.
 * This function uses requestAnimationFrame and Date to return a reliable result.
 * @private
 * @param {integer} speed Duration of animation
 * @param {number} from Starting point
 * @param {number} to End point
 * @param {animationCallback} callback Callback to be run on every step.
 * @returns {function} A looping function.
 */
const animate = (speed, from, to, callback) => {
  const now = Date.now()
  const step = (to - from) / speed
  const loop = () => {
    const then = Date.now()
    const diff = then - now
    const timeLeft = speed - diff

    if (timeLeft > 0) {
      global.requestAnimationFrame(loop)
      callback(from + (step * diff))
    } else {
      global.cancelAnimationFrame(loop)
      callback(to)
    }
  }
  return loop()
}
/**
 * @typedef animationCallback
 * @type {function}
 * @param {number} progress Current value between `from` and `to`
 */

/* istanbul ignore next */
/**
 * Helper to get elements. Similar to jQuery's `$(selector, context)`
 * @private
 * @param {string} selector selector to find
 * @param {HTMLElement} [context=document] Context to search in
 * @returns {array} A list of matching elements
 */
const findAll = (selector, context = document) =>
  Array.from(context.querySelectorAll(selector))

/* istanbul ignore next */
/**
 * Helper to get elements. Similar to jQuery's `$(selector, context)[0]`
 * @private
 * @param {string} selector selector to find
 * @param {HTMLElement} [context=document] Context to search in
 * @returns {HTMLElement} The first matching element
 */
const findFirst = (selector, context = document) =>
  context.querySelector(selector)

/**
 * Returns either the first or second value depending on truthness.
 * Any number is considered true.
 * @private
 * @param {*} either
 * @param {*} or
 * @returns {*} One of the two input values
 */
const eitherOr = (either, or) =>
  typeof either === 'number' ? either : (either || or)

/**
 * A loop using modulo
 * @private
 * @param {number} current Current value
 * @param {number} addition Addition to the current value
 * @param {number} length Maximum value.
 * @returns {number} Resulting number
 */
const modLoop = (current, addition, length) =>
  (current + addition + length) % length

export {
  findAll,
  findFirst,
  animate,
  modLoop,
  eitherOr
}

name: findAll
description: Helper to get elements. Similar to jQuery's `$(selector, context)`

unknown.tagValue: {array} A list of matching elements

name: findFirst
description: Helper to get elements. Similar to jQuery's `$(selector, context)[0]`

unknown.tagValue: {HTMLElement} The first matching element

name: animate
description:
Animates from one value to the other over a given time.
This function uses requestAnimationFrame and Date to return a reliable result.

unknown.tagValue: {function} A looping function.

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback to be run on every step.

name: modLoop
description: A loop using modulo

unknown.tagValue: {number} Resulting number

name: eitherOr
description:
Returns either the first or second value depending on truthness.
Any number is considered true.

unknown.tagValue: {*} One of the two input values

return.description: One of the two input values

name: src/index.js
content:
/**
 * Main export file of Paraglider
 *
 * @file index.js
 * @module Paraglider
 * @author Gregor Adams <greg@pixelass.com>
 */

import Glider from './glider'
import * as presets from './presets'

export {presets}
export default Glider
